summary:
Narcissistic personality disorder (NPD) is a mental health condition where people have an over-inflated sense of self-importance and need constant praise. They often struggle to understand others' feelings. NPD is a type of personality disorder, which are long-lasting patterns of behavior that differ from cultural norms and cause problems in daily life.

There's no one-size-fits-all treatment for NPD. Therapy, like cognitive behavioral therapy, can help, but more research is needed to understand what works best. The person's willingness to change is crucial for successful treatment.
title: Narcissistic personality disorder
